::Shadow Wing/Spears::

Shadow Wing::
She fired again at Dark One. She found it a little hard to keep up 
with im, but she was detterminded to defend her home.

Spears::
She crawled her way over to the side of the ark and took cover behind 
a wing plate that had fallen.  She pulled out a quill and threw it at 
Hiss.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> The Oblitercons:
> 
> 
> 
> Dark One laughed as his radar system detected a robot coming to 
him, barrel 
> rolling out of the way of optic lasers.  This was pathetic of the 
Maximals.  
> He fired off two missiles down at the Ark.  He recieved the 
Predacon 
> transmission.
> 
> -Hmmm...cannon fodder for the Maximals, excellent- he thought to 
himself.  
> Activating his own comm. systme, he sent a reply transmission to 
the 
> Predacons.  "Go ahead and come, I will inform my subordinats." he 
said, soon 
> sending transmissions to the other Oblitercons and the Alliance 
base.
> 
> ---
> 
> Scavenger pulled to the side, Rodimus missing him.  He activated 
his comm. 
> system.  "Hey, Pyro, someone wants to play chicken!" Scavenger 
yelled as he 
> opened fire with a barrage of 20 explosive shells on the Ark.
> 
> ---
> 
> "Excellent!" Pyro replied, heading for Rodimus Prime, firing off 
three fire 
> balls at the robot in vehicle mode.
> 
> ---
> 
> Breakdown felt more shots hit and was ready to transform out of his 
current 
> mode.  He fired off an explosive shell at the Ark, laughing as the 
shell blew 
> up.  He transformed into his robot mode, grenade launcher at the 
ready.
> 
> ---
> 
> Hiss slowly got up,  crawling to his missile launcher, picking it 
up.  He 
> hoped the others would get here, he didn't enjoy being gun fodder.
